body_html:
I see that the test has failed, perhaps I should change maxvalue to np.finfo(dtype).max or np.finfo(dtype).max/2?

For example:

def rng(dtype):
  if np.issubdtype(dtype, np.float):
    maxval=np.finfo(dtype).max
  else:
    maxval=np.iinfo(dtype).max
  return random_ops.random_uniform(
         shape=[2], dtype=dtype, maxval=maxval)
